author: Ogrebeard Meatshield
comment: I used to use a mouse to control my laptop (that's hooked up to my TV via HDMI) but now I use this. It's so much easier. Love that I can add content to my watch list from the couch.  Edit: have to lower to 3 stars. If I leave my Wi-Fi, I have to restart my computer in order for the app to reconnect to VLC. Very annoying.

author: Finn Herzfeld
comment: Nerfed in extremely rude/annoying ways, among other issues. Looks pretty, but I'll take a slightly uglier app that's not quite so pushy about upgrades.

author: pH Ayers
comment: Nerfed without paid version? No thanks

author: Abdulrazak Sirajudeen
comment: Hate it , it must connect with wifi. Not make sense

author: Sadique Salman
comment: I hate this software (basically).
Excellent

author: Joseph Denby
comment: Perfect for a remote control for vlc, just what I wanted. Even bought the full version as it's so useful, only other time I've paid for another app is WhatsApp and this, so I recommend it highly.

author: Slash Network
comment: Search playlist didn't work.

author: Jeremy Matagne
comment: Quite useful, adding files to your Playlist without touching your mouse is quite pleasant

author: Rendy Darmawan
comment: full screen ads

author: Sr. Burns
comment: Ads all the time

author: Monika Bhagat
comment: Doesn't connect
Thanks for all

Great app. To be honest I'm only writing this so the app will zip it about me writing a review. Asked me 3 times just tonight. I enjoy the app immensely, though. It helps me be more lazy while remote controlling my media PC from my couch or bed.

author: Anthony Zurkster
comment: Took all of about 30 seconds to decide if I wanted to pay £2.99p. I can now control my player anywhere around my house! I'm only peeved by the additional purchase price to add gesture control. Hey devs, are you that strapped for cash?

author: G -
comment: Brilliant app... But, I think there maybe a conflict with "Videostream for Google Chromecast"... After some trial and error on not getting a connection, I disabled Videostream and it connected straight away, specifically Videostream running in background...

author: Gr Pwn
comment: Used to be the best option and bought premium, now I'm close to uninstalling. Crashes often when opening folders, up to 3 times a day.  Search doesn't find anything in folders, root and folder names only. Keeps asking for rating after every crash. Update 2/2018: nothing has changed, no improvements.

reply.author: Adarsh Urs
reply.content:
Hi,

Thank you for trying out VLC Mobile Remote.

Which OS are you using on your PC?

Regarding search feature, it's working as it's supposed to be. It's not possible to search inside folders without making network request to your PC, which is we think beyond the scope of this app.

I hope you understand.

Regards

author: Axel Fahy
comment: Just what I needed. However I don't like being prompt for rating the app every week. This is why I changed the rating.

The only negative thing I have to say is I wish the widget was better designed. I have a really modern desktop layout on my phone and this gray rectangle for the widget really brings the looks down but it does work ok. Just wish it looked cleaner with rounded edges.

author: superd4n
comment: Amazing app. Sick and tired of getting up and pause the pc when I'm watching a movie. Best £2.99 I ever spent on an app

author: Pedro Sousa
comment: This app is excellent! Very easy to configure and use. The only downside is not having an option to disconnect/exit. The app will always run on the background  listening to the connecting port to check if VLC is reachable./running. That leads to battery đrain. Besides, we don't want to use the App every time we are using VLC There should be also an option do add remote device by hostname instead of IP

author: Richard Carter
comment: Well thought through app, simple to use and incredibly convenient - allows you to deal with disturbances whilst watching vlc without having to leave your couch. 5* for laziness.

author: Myles Athas
comment: Decent little app, worth the cost, only critique is the nag popup for the rating is very, very persistent. A function recommendation, it would be nice to be able to say "Connect to device X on wireless network Y".

author: Charles Demers
comment: Doesn't work with VLC 2 or 3, says VLC isn't running. But it tires to connect to an old VLC1, which isn't supposedly supported just fine...

author: Joseph Ajila P.
comment: I've tried many apps for this porpuse and this is the one that I love, it's simple and practical. No need to get up from my coach anymore. Edit: Why you put Gestures Control as a new feature if you have to pay to use it?

author: David Sharp
comment: I use it everyday. I like the themes and its really easy to use. Its totally worth paying for. I don't regret it at all. If you use vlc as much as i do at home being able to just sit back and use my phone to select anything from my library is really nice. I never sit at my desk anymore

author: Cormac Sheehan
comment: This app is fantastic. Very easy to use, almost all features are free, incredibly convenient, very responsive over wifi. Definitely recommend for anyone who uses vlc for their video files!

author: Bart Simpson
comment: Full screen scremings advertisement. Hope Google will ban this behavior.

author: Jon Pienaar
comment: Annoying interface, half the features are disabled to make you buy the full version. Crippleware. Ugh.

author: Nikolai Swartz
comment: Good concept. Lately it has issues with youtube connectivity. It still works for offline videos. Just sucks that I paid for the youtube feature

author: Christian H.C.
comment: Notification controls stopped working. Unable to browse files on network storage to play on vlc.

author: Peter Sage
comment: I am pleased to have downloaded and paid for it. So far, I have no problems.

author: Kristoffer Andersen
comment: Works extremely well for everything it tries to do. Coupled with PC Remote VIP, and there is nothing i cant easily control for home cinema purposes through my PC :)

author: Jessie Gordienko
comment: This app is amazing for bedtime!!!! Thanks for enabling my laziness 🐷😴

author: Austin Yattaw
comment: I like it but it needs an option to adjust YouTube quality I have poor internet and can't play videos above 480p so I can't use that feature without constant buffering.

reply.author: Adarsh Urs
reply.content:
Hi, you can change YouTube video quality on app settings page.

Regards

author: Zephan Sturgill
comment: I love this app so much! It makes my life so much easier cause I no longer have to get up to change episodes, volume, etc.

author: Csaba Zámolyi
comment: I like this app. It's really great and easy to use. Maybe there are some limitations, but overall it's great

author: Luke McCarthy
comment: App is alright. I have premium but it crashes after selecting a video unless a push the 'home folder' button first which is kind of annoying...

author: Erratic Bland
comment: Paying to remove adverts is worth it as it's a great app. Works fine as long as phone and pc are on the same network... pc does not need to be wifi

author: Timothy Burns
comment: Easily the best app I have purchased. No more getting up to pause or change volume or even cue up the next show.
